normalised: Hey students! Tired of endless scholarship searches? Worry no more! Ed-tech is buzzing about scholarship portals! These online platforms are like digital treasure chests, overflowing with opportunities for deserving students across India. Think of it as finding the perfect biryani recipe or for your education! From merit-based scholarships for I I T aspirants to need-based aid for students in remote villages of Rajasthan, these portals list them all. One popular portal, "Vidya Dhan," even helped a student from Kochi bag a scholarship to study in the U S! And guess what? Onam is just around the corner, and these portals are seeing a surge in applications. Don't miss out! Many have deadlines in October, so start your search now! They often ask for documents like Aadhaar and Class tenth marksheet. Sites like "ScholarshipPeIndia" and "Buddy four Study" are user-friendly and updated regularly. Forget aimless Google searches; these portals do the heavy lifting. So, ditch the chai break and start exploring. Your academic dreams are just a few clicks away!
